item.title: Prayer BB00630 in English
item.description: O Lord! Thou art the Remover of every anguish and the Dispeller of every affliction. Thou art He Who banisheth every sorrow and setteth free every slave, the Redeemer of every soul. O Lord! Grant deliverance through Thy mercy, and reckon me among such servants of Thine as have gained salvation. (Source category: Tests and Difficulties) (Bahaiprayers.net ID: 344)
